EmailTemplate.description: IN USE Notification email to program officer that contains information about external reviewer who has registered into the system
EmailTemplate.name: Program Officer Notification
EmailTemplate.subject: External Reviewer Profile has been Registered Successfully
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The External Reviewer {!UserRegistration__c.FirstName__c} {!UserRegistration__c.LastName__c} has successfully registered in the Grants Office Enterprise Grants Management System(EGMS).
Please click here to view the registered user's profile.
Please do not reply to this email. You may contact the GovGrants Support Team at govgrants@support.com if you have any questions or need assistance with this task.
Sincerely,
EGMS Team
